ai-mil7.6.6:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, what is the most important thing?”
ai-mil7.6.6:1.2_0: “Great king, having given a hundred spends himself, he tells others to do so.
ai-mil7.6.6:1.3_0: In the same way, when a meditator teaches by sinning encounters, he should give them a teaching and training to extinguishment.
ai-mil7.6.6:1.4_0: This is the basic simple all over a hundred.
ai-mil7.6.6:1.5_0: The senior monk said, “Great king, that’s a boil of rice by the senior monks.”
ai-mil7.6.6:2.3_0: and in both this world and the next.
ai-mil7.6.6:2.4_0: showing them to be shown in.’”
ai-mil7.6.6:3.1_0: The sixth enquiry is the sixth thing.
